title: According to Chris Collins, John Lewis is "a corrupt chimp with a lot of bananas. "
subtitle: A racist icon for the Civil Rights icon (John Lewis) was allegedly forged by a member of the Trump Transition Team (Kris Collins) by a false news website.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The Republic (Kris Collins), a member of the transitional team of President-elect Donald Trump, compared the civic rights icon (John Lewis) with "Chimpanzee spoiled with a lot of bananas and rights."
